org.sedlakovi.celery

Class Worker

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.rabbitmq.client.DefaultConsumer
      • org.sedlakovi.celery.Worker
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.rabbitmq.client.Consumer

    public class Worker
extends com.rabbitmq.client.DefaultConsumer
    Worker that listens on RabbitMQ queue and executes tasks. You can either embed it into your project via create(String, Connection) or start it stand-alone and supply your tasks on classpath like this: 
     java -cp celery-java-xyz.jar:your-tasks.jar org.sedlakovi.celery.Worker --concurrency 8
